 2016-01222016-03-11,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Security Regulations, 2012 (Enhanced Access Controls)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION SECURITY REGULATIONS, 2012 (ENHANCED ACCESS CONTROLS) in order to (1) reinforce Canada's compliance with the International Civil Aviation Organization standard and improve the security of Canada's aviation system; and (2) align the security activities with the risk identified at certain Class 3 airports.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0039 Publication Date: 2016-03-23
AttachmentsAttachment
